articles.description: The big-box retailer is joining a growing list of companies that are trying to nudge workers toward the vaccinations with cash or other incentives.
articles.content:
Target will join a growing list of companies that are offering extra pay and other incentives to try to nudge employees to get a Covid-19 vaccine.
The retail chain said Wednesday that it will offer … [+3277 chars]
